title: Mixed Reality Simulation-Based Classroom Management Competency Development for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Designed to prepare pre-service teachers for diverse situations in virtual classrooms before actual field practice, with a particular focus on disability awareness and problem behavior management simulations

learning_goals: Practice strategies to effectively respond to over five challenging classroom scenarios (e.g., disability-related questions, problematic behaviors) in mixed-reality environments.
Improve at least three aspects of their teaching behavior based on feedback after simulations.
Achieve over 80% practical engagement using the MRS tool under conditions similar to an actual classroom environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
